text: 1. How much of the time during the past 4 weeks did you feel tired?
2. By yourself and not using aids, do you have any difficulty walking up 10 steps without resting?
3. By yourself and not using aids, do you have any difficulty walking a couple of blocks (e.g. several hundred yards)?

4. How many of the following illnesses has a doctor ever told you that you have?
Hypertension, diabetes, cancer (other than a minor skin cancer), chronic lung disease, heart attack, congestive heart failure, angina, asthma, arthritis, stroke, and kidney disease.
